data.comment: The big names in today's match at Mestalla have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 6, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Marcos Llorente of Atletico smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Valencia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 9, Valencia's Carlos Soler is on target but unsuccessful.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Valencia.
Valencia push upfield but Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 13, Atletico pushes forward through Thomas Lemar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Throw-in high up the field for Valencia in Valencia.
In the minute 16, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Valencia have a goal kick.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 20, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Atletico's Jose Gimenez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Valencia a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Valencia drives forward and Uros Racic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Valencia.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Valencia are coming forward and Yunus Musah gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Valencia's Uros Racic has been booked in Valencia.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Atletico in the half of Valencia.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valencia needs to be cautious. Atletico have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Atletico.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Atletico just outside Valencia's area.
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 37, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Free kick Valencia.
In Valencia Atletico drive forward through Thomas Lemar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 39, Atletico have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Valencia's area.
Saul Niguez of Atletico gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 39, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Valencia a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico are pushing forward but Jose Gimenez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Atletico drives forward and Angel Correa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, At Mestalla, Saul Niguez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Atletico's Marcos Llorente misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
The first half has been concluded at Mestalla.
The second-half is underway in Valencia.
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Atletico.
Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 46, Joao Felix is replacing Renan Lodi for Atletico at Mestalla.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 55, Thomas Lemar (Atletico) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico are caught offside.
In the minute 57, Hugo Guillamon (Valencia) gets booked by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a first substitution, with Eliaquim Mangala replacing Hugo Guillamon.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Valencia throw-in in Atletico's half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
Atletico are coming forward and Joao Felix gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Valencia a goal kick.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, The away team replace Saul Niguez with Yannick Carrasco.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 62, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Angel Correa (Atletico) has received a yellow card from Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 63, Free kick Valencia.
Atletico make their third substitution with Vitolo replacing Angel Correa.
The away team have replaced Thomas Lemar with Geoffrey Kondogbia. This is the fourth substitution made today by Diego Simeone.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 69, Valencia to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Throw-in Atletico.
Thierry Correia is on a sub for Yunus Musah for Valencia.
In the minute 71, Javi Gracia is making the team's third substitution at Mestalla with Kevin Gameiro replacing Maxi Gomez.
Ruben Sobrino is replacing Manu Vallejo for the home team.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico at Mestalla.
In the minute 75, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the home team a throw-in.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcos Llorente for Atletico has been booked by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Own goal! Lato Toni scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 81, Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Joao Felix for Atletico has been booked by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Valencia throw-in in Atletico's half.
In the minute 83, Koke is booked for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 84, Jason is replacing Daniel Wass for the home team.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Valencia throw-in in Atletico's half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Atletico a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Valencia.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Valencia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Throw-in for Valencia close to the penalty box.
Joao Felix (Atletico) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Atletico.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Valencia. The final score is 0-1.
